wikimediaapiportaloauth-ui-client-field-: This is displayed to users of your app during authorisation.
Users are redirected to this path following successful authorisation. [[Documentation/Getting started/Authentication#Choosing_a_redirect_URI|Learn more.]]
wikimediaapiportaloauth-ui-client-status: Before your client can be authorised by other users, it must be reviewed and approved by Wikimedia OAuth admins.
